name: Spiced Fried Chicken
description: Fried chicken wrapped in a crispy green skin. The chicken is wrapped in a paste mixed with spices before being deep-fried. They say that finishing this will induce within you an urge to study hard... Can there be such an amazing thing in this world?

suspicious.name: Suspicious Spiced Fried Chicken
suspicious.description: Fried chicken wrapped in a crispy green skin. But before you can even taste the fried chicken, the preponderance of spices already has you choking up... You planned to study after this filling meal, but it seems a glass of water is in order first...
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 510 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Spiced Fried Chicken
normal.description: Fried chicken wrapped in a crispy green skin. The chicken is wrapped in a paste mixed with spices before being deep-fried. They say that finishing this will induce within you an urge to study hard... Can there be such an amazing thing in this world?
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 730 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Spiced Fried Chicken
delicious.description: Fried chicken wrapped in a crispy green skin. Take a bite while it's hot, and the spicy flavor will awaken your taste buds as the bountiful juices burst forth between your teeth, refreshing your spirit... In this state, you feel as if you could learn just about anything!
delicious.effect: Restores 35% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 930 HP every 5s for 30s.
